Events that occurred on 1 December.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1897 - Actor Cyril Ritchard is born.
1913 - J.R.R. Tolkien is elected president of Stapledon Society, a student body at Exeter College.
1914 - Tolkien's close friend at Oxford, Geoffrey Bache Smith, enters service with the Oxfordshire and Buckinghamshire Light Infantry.
1953 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 141d.
1954 - J.R.R. Tolkien starts writing a letter to Rayner Heppenstall.
1973 - Actor Duncan McIntyre dies.
1975 - An Extrapolation on The Silmarillion is published.
1976 - Actor Dean O'Gorman is born.
1986 - Evocation of Virgil in Tolkien's Art is published.
1995 - J.R.R. Tolkien (Writers and Their Work) is published.
2003 - Gollum: How We Made Movie Magic is published.
2003 - Tolkien: A Cultural Phenomenon is published.
2003 – The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King premières in Wellington, New Zealand.
2007 - Chesterton and Tolkien as Theologians is published.
2009 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Siege of Mirkwood expansion is released in North America.
2009 - Born of Hope is released online.
2010 - Middle-earth and Beyond: Essays on the World of J.R.R. Tolkien is published.
2014 - The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies premières in Leicester Square, London.
2016 - A Well of Wonder: C. S. Lewis, J. R. R. Tolkien, and The Inklings is published.
2017 - Death and Immortality in Middle-earth is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Frodo and Samwise rest in Rivendell and prepare for their quest to destroy the One Ring.
